service.name: QW events
service.summary: Application holding the events produced by QubeWire services.

subscribes.name: content-delivery.accepted
subscribes.summary: Event represents the content delivery is accepted and initiated.

subscribes.name: content-delivery.booked
subscribes.summary: Event represents the content booking is successfully made.

subscribes.name: content-delivery.cancelled
subscribes.summary: Event represents the conetent booking is cancelled.

subscribes.name: content-delivery.finished
subscribes.summary: Event represents the content delivery is complete.

subscribes.name: content-delivery.planned
subscribes.summary: Event represents the delivery method is chosen and ready to be processed.

subscribes.name: content-delivery.rejected
subscribes.summary: Event represents the delivery system currently assigned is unable to deliver the content.

markdown.content:
An event based service that contains information about content delivery. It allows you to discover the state of all content deliveries. Additionally, it provides data for a real-time delivery dashboard by streaming events. Checkout the dashboard [here](https://admin.jupiter.staging.qubewire.com/dcp-deliveries).

<NodeGraph />
